clearStorage: If it has been more than 2 seconds. Try clearing your cache/local storage.
variationTooltip: <0>Standalone = Its own tile. </0><1>Append Some = 50% chance to add to another action.</1><2>Append Most = 90% chance to add to another action.</2>
languageChangeMessage: You have changed the language from {{fromLanguage}} to {{toLanguage}}. Would you like to rebuild your game board with the new language?
languageChangeExplanation: Rebuilding will create a new board with actions in the selected language.
privateOptions: Private rooms also have additional board settings.
localTooltip: Playing with other people in person
realtimeTooltip: Best for playing with others online where if someone leaves, they are gone.
delayedTooltip: Best for playing in person where people will turn off their device between rounds.
privateRequired: Please go to a private room to access these options.
difficultyHint: How fast we ramp up to the higher activity options
difficultyTooltip:
<0>Normal: Gradually increase to your highest chosen option.

Accelerated: Jump directly to your maximum chosen option + 1 level below.
consumptionWarning: Warning: You will have a lot of consumption actions (Alcohol, Poppers, Vaping) compared to any other category. Play with care.
readRollDisable: Do not reading my rolls actions.
noVoicesAvailable: No voices available for this language
supportedSites: Supported Sites: vimeo, youtube, google drive, pornhub, xhamster, dropbox.
requiresEmbeddedUrl: Requires public embed url: thisvid, boyfriendtv
randomTimerRange: Randomly sets the roll countdown between the picked values.
rebuildBoardDescription: Keep the same settings. New mix of actions.
finalDifficultyDescription: Use the difficulty from the end of the game to make a new board.
changeSettingsDescription: Open the settings dialog to fully change the game.
customAdded: Game tile added to your game.
autoCloseModal: This modal will automatically close after {{timeLeft}} seconds.
autoCloseStopped: This modal will no longer automatically close.
pickSomething: Please select at least one action from the Board tab before updating the game.
appendWithAction: Append options require at least one standalone action. Please select a non-append action from the Board tab.
gameDesc: <0>Blitzed Out</0><1></1><2>An online adult sex board game for kinky people. Designed for solo play, couples or parties.</2><3>Customize your own board or import someone else's, find your own room and play with other people online.</3>
gettingStartedDescription: <0><0><0>Pick a display name and access game (if you have 'Import', then skip to the last bullet).</0></0><1><0>Select your options. (append will add that option to other tiles).</0></1><2><0>When it is your turn, click the roll button and follow the prompts.</0></2></0><1>Don't like your current board or some aspect of the game? Go to Menu, then Settings and change it. Utilize custom tiles to make the game even more your own.</1><2>New player suggestion: Limit your selections to less than 4 total options.</2>
couplesDescription: <0>Playing in the same room with a partner or friends?</0><1>Settings > Application > Private Room > Local Party.</1><2>Note: If you do not want to interact with those in the room, choose Solo.</2>
coachDescription: <0>Settings > Application > Read my rolls > Save/Access Game. Then click the up arrow next to roll and pick your auto roll interval.</0><1>The game will then automatically roll and read off the action you should take.</1>
gameBoardDescription: Imported Note: 'Settings Generated Board' and 'Imported Board' will be overwritten when their corresponding action is performed UNLESS you rename them.
rebuiltBoard: Rebuilt game board due to room size changes by {{messageUser}}.
boardWrongSize: Board is the wrong size. {{size}} tiles required.
importInvalidTitle: Invalid title for entry {{entry}}. Ensure it is wrapped in brackets and on its own line.
importMissingDescription: Entry {{entry}} is missing a description. All entries must have a description on its own line.
importTitleRequired: Title is required to save a board.
title: Title
ctExplainedDescription: <0>Game tiles let you add your own variations to the game board. Utilize this dialog to add and remove tiles as you see fit.</0><1>Game tiles are added based on the kink and intensity you pick from the drop down. As such, you need to have that kink and intensity (or a higher intensity) selected for your game tiles to show on the board.</1><2>Miscellaneous tiles are the only exception to the above. Regardless of what other options you pick, Miscellaneous tiles will show as their own group. If you use this option, ensure that you add multiple tiles to minimize repeats.</2>
ctIdeasDescription: <0>Add new Activities</0><1>Come up with new activities that are not part of the existing list</1><2>Add harder tiles to easier intensities</2><3>When you pick higher intensity levels, the game will use the earlier intensity level and gradual move to what you picked. If you want harder tiles early on, add several to lower intensities.</3><4>Example: You play Poppers - Advanced. Add advanced tiles to Poppers - Beginner</4><5>Combine activities into a single tile</5><6>Combine multiple activities together in a single tile that normally would not go together.</6><7>Example: Spit roast. Use a toy in your throat and ass at the same time.</7><8>Miscellaneous custom tiles</8><9>Miscellaneous tiles allow you to add your own tiles without including other groups. Be aware, you will want to add several options to this group to minimize repeats.</9>
ctImportDescription: Show a list of all game tiles. Import will ADD new entries from provided list.
ctSeparatorError: Make sure that you add a --- on a new line between game tiles and your groups are wrapped in brackets.
ctGroupError: Invalid group. Ensure your group matching a format listed in 'Add Game Tiles' and is wrapped in brackets.
ctActionError: You need to ensure each entry that has a group also has an action
publicOrPrivate: Are you playing in a public or private room?
playingWithPeople: Are you physically interacting with people?
yesInteracting: Yes, I am playing with people.
noInteracting: No, I am playing with myself.
nakedDisclaimer: * You can change settings once naked.
actionsDisclaimer:
Remember: Less is more.
You don't need to pick 6 total items.
intensityTooltip: As you play, actions will change from lowest level to max level.
standaloneOrCombine: How should we handle consume tasks?
combineWithActions: Combine them with the other actions.
orgasmDisclaimer: You can always change this later in settings.
yesOrgasm: Yes, I will at the end.
resetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.

groupTypes.foreplay: Foreplay - Appears in local mode (before intimate actions)
groupTypes.sex: Sex - Appears in local mode (intimate actions)
groupTypes.consumption: Consumption - Appears in all modes (drinks, substances, etc.)

placeholder.cleanFormat: Paste clean v2.0 format JSON data here...

errors.selectGroupToExport: Please select a group to export

formatGuide.title: Clean v2.0 Format Guide
formatGuide.description: The Clean v2.0 format separates group structure from custom content for easier manual editing:
formatGuide.keySectionsContent:
• groups: Group definitions with labels, types, and intensity names
• customTiles: Your custom tiles organized by group and intensity number
formatGuide.manualEditingContent:
• Edit group labels and intensity names safely
• Add/remove custom tiles in the customTiles section
• Custom tiles work with both custom and default groups
• Locale must be 'en', 'es', or 'fr'
• Group type must be 'solo', 'foreplay', 'sex', or 'consumption'
formatGuide.customTilesFormatContent:
Each tile can be a string (action only) or object with action and tags:
• Simple: "action text"
• With tags: {"action": "text", "tags": ["tag1", "tag2"]}
